definition: to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment

sentences.english: The referee called the goal illegal.
sentences.chinese: 裁判員判定該進球無效。

sentences.english: The umpire lost his cap and his cool.
sentences.chinese: 裁判員丟了帽子，大爲激動。

sentences.english: No appeal will be accepted. The decisions of the referee on the spot will be final.
sentences.chinese: 大會不設上訴，一切賽果以當場裁判員的決定爲準。

sentences.english: When he acts impolitely towards the judges or disobeys their decisions;
sentences.chinese: 比賽中對裁判員有不禮貌的行爲或不服從裁判。

sentences.english: The referee whistled and the game began.
sentences.chinese: 裁判員吹了哨，比賽開始。

sentences.english: An umpire must be an entirely disinterested but keen observer.
sentences.chinese: 一個裁判員必須公正無私而且具有敏銳的洞察力。

sentences.english: B The tennis player disagreed with the umpire's ruling.
sentences.chinese: 網球手不同意裁判員的判決。

sentences.english: The referee started counting over the fallen boxer.
sentences.chinese: 裁判員對着倒在地上的拳擊手開始數數。

sentences.english: At the referee's whistle the players unpiled.
sentences.chinese: 聚成一堆的運動員聽到裁判員的哨聲而散開。

sentences.english: The goal judge raises both flags.
The fiery player has had numerous run- ins with referees.
sentences.chinese: 這位脾氣暴躁的隊員曾和裁判員發生過無數次爭吵。

sentences.english: The umpire ruled that the batsman was out.
sentences.chinese: 裁判員裁定擊球手出局。

sentences.english: Knowledge has no limits. I wish you to become the very best international basketball referee.
sentences.chinese: 學無止境，祝願您成爲最優秀的國際級籃球裁判員。

sentences.english: Additional IFSC Judges may be appointed.
sentences.chinese: 也許會指派額外的IFSC裁判員。

sentences.english: The umpire gare his decision with an airadmitting of no gainsay.
sentences.chinese: 譯裁判員以不容反對的神氣作出了決定。

sentences.english: The judges were very impressed with the snowboarder's amazing flips .
sentences.chinese: 裁判員們對滑雪運動員驚人的空翻留下深刻印象。

pinyin: Nei4 zheng4 bu4 Jing3 zheng4 shu3

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
to stipulate/to state expressly/to explicitly provide for
